1,Create and Manage Tasks in Pet Planning Application,"Navigate to the planning page, create tasks with details, and manage them through multiple steps. Verify task creation and page navigation.","Step 1: Navigate to planning
Step 2: Select pet options and enter details in the form.

column2: - Step 1: Click on item PetV1 -> Navigate to page 'generic#pet-v1'
- Step 4: Select option with input value from select SelectProject
- Step 7: Select option with input value from select MultiSelectNative

column1: Step 3: Click on button CreateTask

Step 9: Click on button CreateTaskMultiStep
Step 10: Input task details and proceed to form submission.

column2: - Step 2: Enter input value in input TaskName3
